# cloudconnexa_vpn_regions (Data Source)

Use a `cloudconnexa_vpn_regions` data source to read all CloudConnexa VPN regions.

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->

## Schema

### Read-Only

- `regions` (List of Object) The list of regions. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--regions))

<a id="nestedatt--regions"></a>

### Nested Schema for `regions`

Read-Only:

- `continent` (String) The continent of the region.
- `country` (String) The country of the region.
- `country_iso` (String) The ISO code of the country of the region.
- `id` (String) The id of the region.
- `name` (String) The name of the region.
